name: Splatoon™ Global Testfire
description: THIS JUST IN! The Splatoon™ Global Testfire is returning for one final splatterrific round! Did you miss out on the first Splatoon Global Testfire special demo? To celebrate the upcoming release of the Splatoon game on 5/29, players around the world can jump online* and fight it out in fast and furious 4-on-4 Turf War battles! Players will have a single hour to test their skills, starting at 3:00 p.m. PT on Saturday, 5/23. You'll need a broadband Internet connection to participate. To join, download the free Splatoon Global Testfire special demo from Nintendo eShop for Wii U, and then launch the demo during the designated time period! This Testfire will feature the same weapons and stages from the first Testfire event. If you missed the first event, don’t miss this final chance to get inked before launch! Event time (You can only play during this time period) 5/23 (Sat) 3:00 p.m. - 4:00 p.m. PT *Broadband Internet access required for online features. For more info, go to support.nintendo.com
